name: Bolide (David Su)
description:
Overview

Bolide is an experimental side-scroller game in the form of an audio plugin. The game is controlled by a track's audio input, and in turn effects the track's audio output! 

Available Formats

VST3, AU

Installation

Download the latest version of Bolide, then unzip and place the individual files into the appropriate plugin folders for your respective DAWs

For Mac, this usually means:

VST3 --> ~/Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST3 AU --> ~/Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/Components

And for Windows, this usually means:

VST3 --> C:\Program Files\Common Files\VST3
